title: GRANDSTANDING With Justin Tosi & Brandon Warmke
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary:
Is moral grandstanding harmful? Is it something a virtuous person would do? I'm joined by Justin Tosi and Brandon Warmke to discuss their book on the issue.

Support on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PoliticalPhilosophyPodcast
